overview: Ã–rjan Johansson was one of the founders of the Bluetooth SIG which is the foundation for the Bluetooth de facto standard invented by Ericsson. At Ericsson he was also the Director & General Manager for Bluetooth Technology & Products. Before joining Ericsson Mr. Johansson has experience from building and industrial automation. He was serving as a part of the management teams in automation companies related to Alfa-Laval, Tetra Pak, ABB and Incentive AB. Prior to the current positions Mr. Johansson was Chairman of the Board and later President and CEO of Anoto Group AB. Today Mr. Johansson, apart from working at Conveneer as Chairman of the Board, is serving as board member of Ã–resund IT Academy, Teknopol AB and Trivector System AB.
